Instruction: Preheat the broiler in the oven.
Combine mango and fresh basil in a medium bowl.
Place equal amounts of the mango and fresh basil mixture on top of each slice of bread. Adjust the amount of Romano cheese based on preference, then sprinkle it over the mixture.
Broil the topped bread slices for 2 to 3 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and lightly browned. Serve hot.
